mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT pr.prc_code, pr.prc_nm, cd1.det_nm || ' ' || cd2.det_nm AS dep_nm, qi.qua_nm, ve.emp_id FROM process pr JOIN work_order wo ON pr.prc_id = wo.prc_id JOIN work_process wp ON wo.wrk_id = wp.wrk_id JOIN quality_item qi ON pr.qua_id = qi.qua_id JOIN code_detail cd1 ON pr.det_id = cd1.det_id JOIN code_detail cd2 ON wp.wpo_team = cd2.det_id JOIN view_employee ve ON ve.emp_dep_nm = cd1.det_nm AND ve.emp_team_nm = cd2.det_nm WHERE ve.emp_id = #{empId}

SELECT wo.wrk_id, vs.prd_code, vs.prd_nm,
vs.prd_color, vs.prd_size, vs.prd_height, vs.odd_id, vs.odd_cnt,
wp.wpo_id, wp.wpo_ocount, wp.wpo_jcount, qh.qhi_bcount,
wp.wpo_status, cd.det_nm AS wpo_status_Name, vs.ord_end_date, wp.wpo_team, wp.wpo_step
FROM work_order wo JOIN process p ON wo.prc_id = p.prc_id JOIN work_process wp ON wp.wrk_id = wo.wrk_id JOIN vw_suju_summary vs ON wo.odd_id = vs.odd_id LEFT JOIN code_detail cd ON wp.wpo_status = cd.det_id LEFT JOIN quality_item qi ON p.qua_id = qi.qua_id AND qi.qua_type='qua_type_03' LEFT JOIN quality_history qh ON qi.qua_id = qh.qua_id AND wp.wpo_id=qh.qhi_target_id
JOIN ( SELECT e.emp_dep_nm, e.emp_team_nm, emp.emp_dep_cd, emp.emp_team_cd FROM VIEW_EMPLOYEE e JOIN EMPLOYEE emp ON e.emp_id = emp.emp_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{empId} ) my_emp ON TRIM(LOWER(wp.wpo_team)) = TRIM(LOWER(my_emp.emp_team_cd)) AND p.det_id = my_emp.emp_dep_cd WHERE wp.wpo_status != 'wpo_sts_00' AND wo.wrk_ord_date >= TO_DATE(#{yearMonth}||'01','YYYYMMDD') AND wo.wrk_ord_date <= ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{yearMonth}||'01','YYYYMMDD'),1) ORDER BY CASE WHEN wpo_status = 'wpo_sts_09' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, wpo_id OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) AS ALLCOUNT FROM work_order wo JOIN process p ON wo.prc_id = p.prc_id JOIN work_process wp ON wp.wrk_id = wo.wrk_id JOIN vw_suju_summary vs ON wo.odd_id = vs.odd_id LEFT JOIN code_detail cd ON wp.wpo_status = cd.det_id LEFT JOIN quality_item qi ON p.qua_id = qi.qua_id AND qi.qua_type='qua_type_03' LEFT JOIN quality_history qh ON qi.qua_id = qh.qua_id AND wp.wpo_id=qh.qhi_target_id
JOIN ( SELECT e.emp_dep_nm, e.emp_team_nm, emp.emp_dep_cd, emp.emp_team_cd FROM VIEW_EMPLOYEE e JOIN EMPLOYEE emp ON e.emp_id = emp.emp_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{empId} ) my_emp ON TRIM(LOWER(wp.wpo_team)) = TRIM(LOWER(my_emp.emp_team_cd)) AND p.det_id = my_emp.emp_dep_cd WHERE wp.wpo_status != 'wpo_sts_00' AND wo.wrk_ord_date >= TO_DATE(#{yearMonth}||'01','YYYYMMDD') AND wo.wrk_ord_date <= ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{yearMonth}||'01','YYYYMMDD'),1) ORDER BY CASE WHEN wpo_status = 'wpo_sts_09' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, wpo_id
SELECT wp.wpo_id, pr.qua_id FROM work_process wp JOIN work_order wo ON wp.wrk_id = wo.wrk_id JOIN process pr ON wo.prc_id = pr.prc_id WHERE wpo_id = #{wpoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quality_history(qhi_target_id, qua_id, qhi_start_date, qhi_emp_id) VALUES (#{wpoId}, #{quaId}, #{qhiStartDate}, #{qhiEmpId})
mapper.select: SELECT qh.qhi_id FROM quality_history qh JOIN work_process wp ON qh.qhi_target_id = wp.wpo_id JoIN quality_item qi ON qh.qua_id = qi.qua_id WHERE wp.wpo_id = #{wpoId} AND qi.qua_type='qua_type_03'

SELECT wp1.wpo_id, wp1.wrk_id, wo1.odd_id,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM work_process wpx JOIN work_order wox ON wpx.wrk_id = wox.wrk_id WHERE wox.odd_id = wo1.odd_id) AS total_steps,
TO_NUMBER(wp1.wpo_step) AS step,
( SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(wp2.wpo_step)) FROM work_process wp2 JOIN work_order wo2 ON wp2.wrk_id = wo2.wrk_id WHERE wo2.odd_id = wo1.odd_id AND TO_NUMBER(wp2.wpo_step) = TO_NUMBER(wp1.wpo_step) + 1) AS next_step,
wp1.wpo_jcount, NVL(qh.qhi_bcount,0) AS bcount,
(SELECT MIN(wp2.wpo_id) FROM work_process wp2 JOIN work_order wo2 ON wp2.wrk_id = wo2.wrk_id WHERE wo2.odd_id = wo1.odd_id AND TO_NUMBER(wp2.wpo_step) = TO_NUMBER(wp1.wpo_step) + 1) AS next_wpo_id
FROM work_process wp1 JOIN work_order wo1 ON wp1.wrk_id = wo1.wrk_id LEFT JOIN quality_history qh ON qh.qhi_target_id = wp1.wpo_id WHERE wp1.wpo_id = #{wpoId}
mapper.update: UPDATE suju_order_detail sod SET sod.odd_actual_cnt = #{wpoOcount}, sod.odd_sts = 'odd_sts_04', sod.odd_mod_date=#{oddModDate}, sod.odd_bcount = ( SELECT NVL(SUM(qh.qhi_bcount), 0) FROM quality_history qh WHERE qh.qhi_target_id IN ( SELECT wp2.wpo_id FROM work_process wp2 JOIN work_order wo2 ON wo2.wrk_id = wp2.wrk_id WHERE wo2.odd_id = sod.odd_id ) ) WHERE sod.odd_id IN ( SELECT wo.odd_id FROM work_order wo JOIN work_process wp ON wp.wrk_id = wo.wrk_id WHERE wp.wpo_id = #{wpoId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT iNTO suju_history ( odd_id, odd_sts, his_date, emp_id ) VALUES(#{ODD_ID}, 'odd_sts_04', #{oddModDate}, #{empID})
mapper.select: SELECT wp.wpo_id, wr.wre_id, wr.emp_id, ve.emp_num, ve.emp_nm, wr.wre_jcount, wr.wre_date, wr.wre_memo, wp.wpo_ocount FROM work_report wr JOIN view_employee ve ON wr.emp_id=ve.emp_id JOIN work_process wp ON wr.wpo_id = wp.wpo_id WHERE wr.wpo_id = #{wpoId}
